metadata.title: CVE-2014-5203 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
wp-includes/class-wp-customize-widgets.php in the widget implementation inWordPress 3.9.x before 3.9.2 might allow remote attackers to executearbitrary code via crafted serialized data.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-5203` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

wordpress - 3.9.2+dfsg-1
wordpress-l10n - 3.9.2+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentyfifteen - 3.9.2+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentyseventeen - 3.9.2+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentysixteen - 3.9.2+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wordpress package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.9.2+dfsg-1').
